nodes.text: A catastrophe occurred on Mokivj, when in an effort to collapse the Separatists' cortosis mine on Mokivj, Jedi General Anakin Skywalker accidentally sent lava, ash, and smoke into the planet's best cropland and water. Skywalker did not account for the cortosis in the mine to redirect the heat of the explosives, which ended up sending the explosions straight down through the crust of the planet and into its magma, instead of just collapsing the mine tunnels. The result was widespread devastation.
